description: You got promoted! Enhance your stats in all areas.
name: Forbidden mask

description: Reduce your heart containers and add shields. Also increase your weapon's damage.
name: Cyborg

description: Increase your weapon damage and movement speed. Forget sheep, you keep dreaming of unicorns...
name: Nerve system 6.0

description: The power of love! Add shields. Increase your weapon's damage.
name: Heart of the ocean

description: Stylish eye protection, with added benefits. Add shields and increase your rate of fire.
name: Future tech

description: You've never felt stronger. Or better-looking. Add shields. Some attacks will deal no damage to you.
name: Sturdy shield

description: Each time you activate the Portal Stone, there's a chance of getting a shield.
name: Energy cube

description: You fight for humanity! After each battle, you might receive extra shields.
name: Last hope

description: Increase your gun's damage and add shields. An incredible source of power. You've no idea how it works. Strings, maybe?
name: Quantum core

description: Add a heart container and a crystal container. Keep the sun and rain off your face so you can concentrate on meditating.
name: Monk hat

description: Add a crystal container. You can get crystals after killing enemies.
name: Shroud

description: 98%...99%... Add a crystal container and increase your gun's damage.
name: Bent spoon

description: The beautiful gem in this turban functions as a number of crystal containers.
name: Persian turban

description: Add a crystal container. You can recover hearts by using 5 crystals.
name: Ritual mask

description: An extravagant crystal mask. It can be used as a crystal container and adds a shield - because no one wants to hit it.
name: Unknown mask

description: Time is a meaningless mortal construct. You understand this now, and your movement speed increases.
name: Melting calendar

description: This orange will make you SUPER strong. Increase your movement speed and weapon damage.
name: Mutated orange

description: Increase your movement speed. You'll drop extra coins when you use keys.
name: Royal antlers

description: A bite can keep you going all day. Increase your movement speed and recover a heart.
name: Elf bread

description: The sweet sneakers will increase your movement speed. Gotta go fast.
name: Running shoes

description: Increase your movement speed, weapon damage, and melee damage.
name: Motorcycle helmet

description: Healthy food! Contains a wide variety of vitamins! Add a heart container.
name: Broccoli

description: It'll bring tears to your eyes! ...Why, because it's so tasty, of course! Add a heart container.
name: Pepper soup

description: Atomized Cola, drink of the space age! Add a heart container and increase your weapon damage slightly.
name: Space soda

description: Trade your IQ for POWER! Add a heart container. Increase your weapon damage, but reduce your rate of fire.
name: Giant barbecue

description: It's always summer when you're eating a popsicle. Add a heart container.
name: Fruit popsicle

description: Sorry, I don't speak Sushi. Add a heart container.
name: Sashimi sushi

description: A beer that is certainly not a milkshake. Add a heart container and a crystal container.
name: Creambeer

description: B.A.D. (Brave And Delicious). Add shields and a heart container.
name: Brave cookies

description: You get some gifts from cats. Also add a heart container.
name: Canned cat food

description: The best beef EVER! Add a heart container.
name: Tobe beef

description: You hear whispers within the bottle... Add a heart container and recover some hearts.
name: Soul flask

description: An edible root known only to the Dwarves. Add a heart container.
name: Earth bread

description: A stick of candied hawthorn. Add a heart container.
name: Tanghulu

description: Easier to aim without glare in your eyes... Increase your weapon's damage.
name: Bodyguard glasses

description: It's raw power and passion, but hard to control. Reduce your rate of fire but greatly increase your weapon damage.
name: Beast amulet

description: These let you increase your weapon damage and melee damage. Don't worry about the sudden craving for flesh.
name: Devil horn

description: Increase your weapon damage and bullet velocity. Stark Brilliance(TM). (Stark is not responsible for any loss of limbs)
name: Stark module

description: It's about discipline. Increase your movement speed and your weapon damage.
name: Medal of honor

description: There's a hole in the world... in your soul. Increase your weapon damage and rate of fire.
name: Void coin

description: Fight through the pain. Let it give you strength. Increase your weapon damage and rate of fire.
name: Pain drop

description: Take a shot. Take the shot. Rinse and repeat. Greatly increase your weapon damage.
name: Hip flask

description: Mow 'em down. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your weapon damage.
name: Garand clip

description: They have the right to remain silent... after they're dead. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your bullet velocity.
name: Police badge

description: Winning is positioning, timing... and being the last alive. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your movement speed.
name: Go board

description: Pull back... Exhale slowly... Let go! TWANG! Add extra bullets per shot and increase your weapon's range.
name: Slingshot

description: Now you know Gun Fu. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your weapon's range.
name: Film magazine

description: Ssssssomebody stop me! Add extra bullets per shot and a shield.
name: Strange mask

description: Let the feathered tip wing you on your way to victory. Increase your weapon's range and rate of fire.
name: Pink dart

description: Let it catch the breeze... Increase your weapon's range and damage.
name: Paper plane

description: They'll never see you coming. Increase your weapon's range and your movement speed.
name: Shadow operation

description: Increase your weapon's range. Also increase your jump height.
name: Telescopic sight

description: This IS the craziest thing you've ever seen. Greatly increase your rate of fire.
name: Mad mask

description: Git gud. Increase your rate of fire and movement speed.
name: E-sports headset

description: Exhale as you pull the trigger to give your bullets a bit more oomph. Increase your rate of fire and weapon damage.
name: Paper windmills

description: Let it blow your bullets farther, faster. Increase your weapon's range and rate of fire.
name: Hair dryer

description: This is going to hurt... Increase your rate of fire and weapon damage.
name: Drilling warhead

description: Feel that caffeine hit? It's BULLET TIME. Increase your rate of fire.
name: Espresso

description: Let it guide you... Add shields. Upgrade your weapon.
name: Blue protocol

description: It looks easy enough to install... Upgrade your weapon. Increase your rate of fire.
name: Wade tech

description: You have the King's approval. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your bullet velocity.
name: Like of the king

description: You're at the top of your game. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your jump height and movement speed slightly.
name: Super logo

description: You've worked for this. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your movement speed.
name: Seals patch

description: Clang. Clang. Clang. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your weapon damage.
name: Smithing hammer

description: The relic of the first civilization. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your movement speed slightly.
name: Golden apple

description: ABSOLUTE POWER! Upgrade your weapon, increase both your melee and weapon damage.
name: Power diamond

description: A ring of lightning will surround you and damage nearby enemies.
name: Tesla coil

description: A little sacrifice goes a long way... Trade one heart container for the ability to fly.
name: Demon wings

description: Your soul swells and you feel your feet lift off the ground... Increase your movement speed.
name: Divinity

description: You feel strong, feathery wings at your back. Flap them and lift into the air!
name: Pegasus

description: You can fly now! Increase your movement speed.
name: Wings of wisdom

description: This green cap will diminish you... That is, it will make you smaller. See the world from a new angle!
name: Green cap

description: A cake with "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" written on it. You are bigger and have the chance to recover hearts when you get hurt.
name: Birthday cake

description: Jumping can cause damage to enemies. It's time to have some fun.
name: Red hat

description: Every time you jump, you leave a mine behind you. That sounds crazy or crazy AWESOME?
name: Dangerous mine

description: You will shoot straight down while you're in the air.
name: Fatal dance

description: The light is warm. Get an extra treasure room at each new level.
name: Golden torch

description: It sees ...... EVERYTHING! Including your inner desires and fears.
name: Lidless eye

description: Reveal the truth. Show all rooms on your map.
name: Silver compass

description: Mark all hidden rooms on your map. You can see a faint signature on the back - Captain Jack S....?
name: Treasure map

description: BEEP. BEEP. BEEP. Mark all secrets on your map.
name: Mini radar

description: A very useful tool. Reveal all nearby hidden rooms.
name: Little pickaxe

description: This is a legendary trophy. You can revive after death. (Can only be used once.)
name: Immortal heart

description: You can revive after death, but you feel a little... different. (Can only be used once.)
name: Sun coin

description: You can revive after death, but you feel... tired. (Can only be used once.)
name: Heart of fire

description: Are you dead or are you alive? You won't know until you die and wake up... and there's a chance you might.
name: Schrödinger's bet

description: You can preview the description of an item without picking it up.
name: Inner eye

description: The coin will explode after 3 seconds if you haven't picked it up. Time is money, right?
name: Coin bomb

description: The more coins you have, the more damage your weapon does.
name: Mercenary lord

description: You have a chance to get a guard sprite when you use coins. Don't you want to kiss it?
name: Golden statuette

description: Pay to Win! The more coins you have, the more bullets you can shoot.
name: Battle pass

description: The more coins you have, the faster you can shoot.
name: Golden bird

description: You can use eggs as bombs when you don't have any bombs.
name: Shark bait

description: If you don't have a key, you can use an egg instead.
name: Empty can

description: May the love be with you. Double the amount of hearts recovered.
name: Mercy hood

description: Your weapon does more damage when you're at full hearts.
name: King's crown

description: This unbelievable bean will recover all your hearts and increase your weapon's range.
name: Magical bean

description: The fewer hearts you have, the more damage your weapon does. SPARTAN!!!
name: Spartan lineage

description: The fury drive your body. The fewer hearts you have, the more bullets you can shoot.
name: Berserker blood

description: Hearts will be replaced by shields when they drop. The creator slightly modified the rules of the universe.
name: Howard reactor

description: Each time you pick up a key, your weapon damage will increase. Each time you use a key, your weapon damage will reduce.
name: Agent watch

description: You can use keys as bombs when you don't have any bombs.
name: Pen no.7

description: The more keys you have, the faster your weapon shoots.
name: Steel gear

description: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop an extra bomb or an instant mine.
name: Rusty key

description: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop extra eggs.
name: Bear pendant

description: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll get an angry sprite.
name: Evil bracelet

description: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop extra hearts.
name: Heart necklace

description: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll get a protective shell.
name: Jewelry box

description: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop extra shields.
name: Black box

description: Your weapon does more damage when your crystal containers are full. You have a big plan.
name: Magic vortex

description: This cat-faced amulet vibrates softly around magic. The fewer crystals you have, the more damage your weapon does.
name: Cat medallion

description: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra bombs.
name: Emerald bracelet

description: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra hearts.
name: Ruby earrings

description: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra keys.
name: Silver brooch

description: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra crystals.
name: Amethyst necklace

description: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra shields.
name: Sapphire ring

description: While in this room, each time you pick something up, your weapon damage will increase.
name: Beggar's card

description: While in this room, each time you pick something up, your movement speed and jump height will increase.
name: Rogue's badge

description: You receive delivery of a batch of bombs.
name: Dangerous receipt

description: Turn all wooden chests to cursed chests.
name: Cursed coin

description: Get 250 coins. This is what you need.
name: Accidental wealth

description: 777 coins! You feel extremely lucky... and lonely.
name: Lottery ticket

description: If you don't have a key, you can use coins instead.
name: Locksmith

description: Each time you pick up a bomb, you get an extra one.
name: Gunpowder plot

description: Meow... You get an extra bonus when you pick up coins.
name: Maneki-neko

description: Each time you pick up a key, you get an extra one.
name: Magician hat

description: If you don't have a key, you can use half a heart instead.
name: Heart key

description: I got this! Keys are no longer a problem.
name: Hacking tool

description: It's shopping time! Everything in the shop is half price!
name: Black friday

description: Don't get it on your teeth. The shop will now replenish.
name: Lipstick

description: This is the future, and you're a big dreamer. The more shields you have, the more damage your weapon does.
You will lose hearts first even if you have shields. You are gradually accepting this fact.
name: Iron heart

description: The more shields you have, the more bullets your weapon shoots.
name: Combat helmet

description: The more shields you have, the more melee damage you do.
name: Advanced knife

description: The more shields you have, the faster you fire.
name: Thunder engine

description: When you lose a shield, there's a chance you'll get a guardian sprite.
name: Virtual assistant

description: Do androids dream? When you have shields, you can make an extra jump.
name: Electric sheep

description: All shields you get will turn to coins instead.
name: Energy converter

description: There's a chance that you'll block damage taken from behind.
name: Turtle hat

description: There's a chance that you'll block bullets fired at you.
name: Frying pan

description: There's a chance that you'll block melee damage from enemies.
name: Kendo mask

description: You get a temporary protective shell per room.
name: Onion helmet

description: You won't take any environmental damage.
name: Hard hat

description: Upgrade your gun if you get hurt while in this room.
name: Dance mask

description: Increase your rate of fire if you get hurt while in this room.
name: Scarlet tale

description: It's Friday! Increase your weapon's damage when you get hurt.
name: Midnight mask

description: Make them regret ever touching you. Drop 6 instant bombs when you get hurt.
name: Metal panties

description: Oof. Hope you like soup. Drop coins when you get hurt.
name: Golden teeth

description: You have a chance to drop extra crystals when you get hurt.
name: Annoying hat

description: You have a chance to receive random goodies when you get hurt.
name: Dimensional bags

description: You have a chance to drop extra shields when you get hurt.
name: Robot armor

description: If you get hurt in this room, a ring of lightning will surround you and damage nearby enemies.
name: Power helmet

description: You have a chance to drop extra keys when you get hurt by an explosion.
name: Welding mask

description: When you get hurt, you will explode. Anyone who survives might learn a lesson.
name: Pumpkinhead

description: You have a chance to get a evil sprite when you get hurt.
name: Nightmare mask

description: You have a chance to gain crystals when you get hurt.
name: Magic wand

description: You have a chance to gain shields when you get hurt. There are some questions you can't avoid.
name: Ghost shell

description: You will get a random item if you get hurt 6 times in the same room.
name: Hiccups

description: You have a chance to get a guard sprite when you get hurt.
name: Kongming lantern

description: If you are down to half a heart, you'll immediately deal damage to all enemies.
name: Dark side

description: If you're down to half a heart, you'll gain the ability to fly.
name: Bamboo dragonfly

description: If you're down to half a heart, you'll immediately drop a shield.
name: V.o. field

description: DON'T PANIC! You'll only lose half a heart when you get hurt.
name: The towel

description: Each time you get hurt, there's a chance you'll take double damage... or no damage at all.
name: Devil's trade

description: You're immune to explosion damage.
name: Big daddy

description: You have a chance to recover hearts when you get hurt by an explosion.
name: Fanatic mask

description: Deal melee damage to enemies who make contact with you.
name: Crown of thorns

description: Nothing is True. Everything is Permitted. Do more weapon damage when you attack from behind.
name: Shadow blade

description: Don't let up! The more enemies you hit without stopping, the more weapon damage you'll do.
name: Player zero ready

description: You have a chance to get 1 angry sprite each time you kill an enemy by bombs.
name: Demon book

description: You have a chance to recover hearts each time you kill an enemy with bombs.
name: Ancient mask

description: You have a chance to drop extra shields each time you kill an enemy.
name: Inorganic mod

description: Each time an enemy is killed in this room, your weapon damage increases.
name: Grim hood

description: You get twice the coins after you kill enemies.
name: Most wanted list

description: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra bombs.
name: Boom gloves

description: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra eggs.
name: Rainforest souvenir

description: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra keys.
name: Screwdriver

description: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra shields.
name: Prophet chip

description: Art is an explosion! There's a chance that killing an enemy will release an explosion from you.
name: Clay doll

description: You have a chance to get a protective shell each time you kill an enemy by bombs.
name: Sacred tears

description: You have a chance of recovering half a heart each time you kill an enemy.
name: Plague mask

description: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra hearts.
name: Death believer

description: Kill enough enemies, and you'll get crystals.
name: Slayer of demons

description: Each time an enemy is killed in this room, your eye gets sharper, increasing your weapon attack speed.
name: Ready aim eye

description: Each time you kill an enemy, there's a chance it will explode.
name: B-virus

description: Each time an enemy is killed in this room, your weapon bullets increase.
name: Bullet crown

description: Increase your weapon damage when you are in the air.
name: Air force medal

description: Fire a special bullet every ten shots, causing greater damage to the enemy.
name: Night vision

description: There's a chance you'll fire a big bullet.
name: Samurai's soul

description: Peekaboo! I see you! There's a chance your bullets will track enemies.
name: Soldier mask

description: All your bullets will explode on impact or after they travel a certain distance. Enjoy the show.
name: Popcorn

description: There's a chance your bullet will create a beautiful firework.
name: Iron crown

description: Your bullet will create a platform on the wall.
name: Seed of stone

description: There's a chance your bullet will split into extra bullets. A beautiful display of death.
name: Flowerpot

description: There's a chance your bullet will split into extra bullets. Stay out of the danger zone.
name: Fission device

description: There's a chance your bullet will split into extra bullets. We know it's tempting, but don't lick any.
name: Cherry taste

description: The victory of science! Your bullet will randomly rebound when it hits the wall.
name: Elastic gel

description: Some of your bullets have shields that can block enemy bullets.
name: Atlantis bubble

description: Your gun is full of electricity! All your bullets now deal electric damage.
name: Danger sign

description: Let your gun burn! All your bullets now deal fire damage.
name: Hot chili

description: Cool down your gun! All your bullets now deal ice damage.
name: Cooling system

description: Your poison runs through their veins. All your bullets now deal poison damage.
name: Bad apple

description: Your bullets can pass through enemies.
name: X-ray

description: Ain't nothing gonna stop you now! Your bullets can pass through walls.
name: Gamma ray

description: There's a chance you'll fire a bouncy bullet.
name: Ping pong

description: There's a chance you'll fire a heat-seeking bullet.
name: Alien tech

description: There's a chance you'll fire a laser. Whether or not it hits anything is another matter...
name: Imperial force

description: There's a chance you'll fire a fake rat. And who wouldn't be scared of that?
name: Clown hat

description: There's a chance you'll fire a ricocheting bullet.
name: Hand mirror

description: There's a chance you'll fire a heat-seeking rocket.
name: Rocket mod

description: There's a chance you'll fire multiple bullets.
name: Beehive

description: There's a chance you'll fire an electric bullet.
name: Lithium battery

description: There's a chance you'll fire a flame bullet.
name: Szechuan sauce

description: There's a chance you'll fire an ice bullet.
name: Snow globe

description: There's a chance you'll fire a poison bullet.
name: Gas mask

description: You have a chance to shoot random element bullets.
name: Jelly beans

description: There's a chance you'll fire a piercing bullet.
name: Ghost nail

description: Double your melee attack damage when you are in the air.
name: Devil hotline

description: Each time you destroy a wooden box using melee damage, you gain 1 coin.
name: Golden fist

description: The more coins you have, the more melee damage you do.
name: Golden skulls

description: While in this room, the more times you use your melee attack, the more damage it does.
name: Whetstone

description: Your melee attacks cause enemies to explode when they die.
name: Hunter queen

description: Your favorite weapon! Increase your melee attack damage.
name: The crowbar

description: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance an instant bomb will drop.
name: War hammer

description: The more eggs you have, the more melee damage you do.
name: Furious chicken

description: The more eggs you have, the more melee range you have.
name: Toy home run bat

description: Your melee attack deals electric damage.
name: Mjolnir

description: Your melee attack deals fire damage.
name: Eric's candle

description: Kill enough enemies in melee, you will recover half a heart.
name: Hungry amulet

description: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance you'll gain a bomb.
name: Electric drill

description: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance to get an egg.
name: Knife and fork

description: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance to get a key.
name: Space spanner

description: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance you'll receive extra crystals.
name: Wizard sword

description: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance you'll receive extra coins.
name: Golden bell

description: Gain shields after killing enemies with melee damage.
name: Kinetic blade

description: Increase your melee damage every time you get hurt in the current room.
name: Gladiator helmet

description: The more times you jump, the more melee damage you do.
name: Headband

description: Sometimes, the Fates just want someone dead. Increase your melee range.
name: Spear of destiny

description: 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 10km every day... your melee damage has skyrocketed!
name: Ordinary gloves

description: Each time you start shooting, automatically make a melee attack.
name: Chainsaw bayonet

description: Launches 10 bouncy bullets after the bomb explodes.
name: Iron frog

description: Launches 10 heat-seeking bullets after the bomb explodes.
name: Alien toy

description: Launches 10 bullets after the bomb explodes.
name: Party popper

description: Launches 10 piercing bullets after the bomb explodes.
name: Ghost bottle

description: Your bomb will clear a certain area of bullets.
name: Smiley bomb

description: There's a chance this bomb will drop a pickup after it explodes.
name: Firecrackers

description: Your bomb will create an X-shaped blast.
name: Blasting cap 5000

description: Your bomb will create a cross-shaped blast.
name: Blasting cap 101

description: The explosion leaves a burst of fire behind.
name: Chemical burn

description: Instead of throwing a bomb, place a mine on the ground.
name: Red flag

description: Bombs explode bigger, brighter, and better.
name: Sapper backpack

description: After the bomb explodes, it will split into more bombs.
name: Nanotechnology

description: Keys are not the only answer! You have a chance to unlock chests or doors with explosions.
name: Plan b

description: After you activate all the Portal Stones, you'll get some eggs.
name: Shaman mask

description: If the egg touches stone - such as doors or chests - they'll both explode and disappear.
name: Matchbox

description: You can manually cancel the hatching process of the egg by pressing [Cancel Key].
name: Eternal stone

description: The more eggs you have, the more damage your bullets do.
name: Vanilla ice cream

description: Your eggs can block bullets from enemies.
name: Acorn

description: Two at a time baby, yeah! Double the number of eggs you have.
name: Double yolks

description: You will drop an extra bomb if you hatch an empty egg.
name: Roly-poly toy

description: When you use a bomb, all your eggs will explode.
name: Black rum

description: You will drop extra hearts if you hatch an empty egg.
name: Chicken burger

description: You will drop an extra key if you hatch an empty egg.
name: Monocle

description: You will drop an extra crystal if you hatch an empty egg.
name: Grape candy

description: You will drop extra shields if you hatch an empty egg.
name: Blueberry cake

description: The more eggs you have, the more bullets you will fire.
name: Doughnut

description: The more eggs you have, the more times you can jump.
name: Lemon jelly

description: If an attack kills you, you'll exchange an egg for half a heart.
name: Gingerbread man

description: The more eggs you have, the further you can shoot.
name: Protein powder

description: The more eggs you have, the faster you can shoot.
name: Saturn lollipop

description: Eggs will hatch random pickups instead of pets.
name: Snack box

description: Eggs can cause touch damage to enemies.
name: Mustard poop

description: Yeah! Increase the damage from all your pets.
name: Gum bear

description: The more pets you have, the more damage your gun does.
name: Lion headgear

description: When you're at full health, your eggs never fail to hatch.
name: Marshmallow

description: The more pets you have, the more bullets you fire.
name: Strawberry candy

description: The more pets you have, the more times you can jump.
name: Worst blowing gum

description: The more pets you have, the further you can shoot.
name: Candy corn

description: The more pets you have, the faster you can shoot.
name: Candy cane

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop a bomb.
name: Chocolate cookies

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop coins.
name: Chocolate coin

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop 2 crystals.
name: Crystal hard candy

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll get a gift.
name: Rainbow candy

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop half a heart.
name: Toffee apple

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop a key.
name: Nougat

description: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop half a shield.
name: Hard mints

description: This is your calling. Increase your jump height and movement speed.
name: Hero mask

description: To infinity... Increase your jump height.
name: Space helmet

description: You wouldn't wear them if they weren't useful, and these let you make an extra jump. Also, they're just like super cute.
name: Rabbit ears

description: No one will ever see you coming. You can make an extra jump. Increase your melee damage.
name: Ninja costume

description: It catches the wind - just like you! You can make an extra jump.
name: Carp streamer

description: Travel farther than ever before. You can make an extra jump.
name: Traveler hood

description: The little wings are so darn cute. And they let you make an extra jump.
name: Winged hat
